# Commit an App Store Review Attachment

**Web Service Endpoint**

Commit an app screenshot after uploading it to the App Store.

## Creating, Modifying, and Deleting Attachments

- **Create an App Store Review Attachment**: Attach a document for App Review to an App Store version.
- **Delete an App Store Review Attachment**: Remove an attachment before you send your app to App Review.
